feature.label: DataTrax SDK Feature
feature.description: SDK for the TCAT DataTrax framework. DataTrax provides a modular system for transforming input data instances into output data by passing data objects (such as documents or images) through a series of configurable transformation algorithms. Transformer implementations can be defined using a registry system (e.g., using Eclipse extension points) and then configured to create a data transformation workflow.
